sharedTokens.title: @asafarim/shared-tokens

sharedI18n.title: @asafarim/shared-i18n
sharedI18n.description: Lightweight, simple translation module for any React + TypeScript app, built on top of i18next and react-i18next. It ships with sensible defaults (English and Dutch) but can support any language by adding JSON files to your locales folder.

showcases.title: Featured Applications
showcases.intro: Explore my featured applications and ongoing projects.

testora-ui.title: Testora UI
testora-ui.description: Testora user interface is built with React and TypeScript, and it is part of the Testora project. It provides a dashboard for monitoring and managing test runs. The backend is built using ASP.NET Core and Entity Framework, PostgreSQL database.

testora-testrunner.title: Testora e2e TestRunner
testora-testrunner.description: TestRunner is a Node.js application that provides a TestCafe engine for running test suites. It is built using Node.js and TypeScript, and it is part of the Testora project. Via SignalR, it can be used to run test suites in real-time.

taskManagement.title: Task Management
taskManagement.description: Task Management is a productivity app to manage personal and team tasks with authentication and dashboards. It is built using React and TypeScript, and it is part of the Task Management project.

smartops.title: SmartOps
smartops.description: SmartOps is a web application that provides a dashboard for monitoring and managing smart operations. It is built using React and TypeScript, and it is part of the SmartOps project.

identityPortal.description: A secure user management and authentication system integrated with ASafariM backend.
